title: The I Do Cookbook for the Bride and Groom
description: The "I Do" Cookbook for the Bride and Groom is pleased to Delicious recipes made from simple ingredients! This mouth-watering bouquet of flavors will satisfy cooks from the beginner to the gourmet chef. Discover the adventure and romance of sharing home cooked meals in your own cozy kitchen. May all your memories be delicious!
author: Celia Jolley
